cu.explanation_en: Setting nr_cellid to 0, which is a reserved value, will cause cell ID configuration validation errors.

du.explanation_en: Setting dl_UL_TransmissionPeriodicity to 10 exceeds the valid range (0-7) for TDD transmission periodicity, causing frame structure errors.
du.explanation_zh: 將 dl_UL_TransmissionPeriodicity 設定為 10 超過有效範圍 (0-7)，會導致 TDD 傳輸週期配置錯誤。
